resources.string: Instead of saving a number into contacts and then searching it in WhatsApp\'s list to be able to talk with it; open this app, write the number, and press open. WhatsApp\'s app will be opened directly on the chat page of that number (if it exists) without modifying yourÂ address book.

1. Go to WhatsApp or WhatsApp Business, Check desired status/story.\n 2. Come back to our app, Click on any image or video to view.\n 3. Click the save button and The desired image/video is instantly saved to your gallery.
